name: denise m
text: The pizza is so good and they got my pizza boxes ready as soon as i told them my name. I  thought i would have to wait alittle bit , but they are good at what they do. They are hard workers. Also the person has good manners for opening the door as well so i  feel you  deserve 5 stars way to go.
